}}'''Minecraft Character Creator Sticker Book''' is a ''Minecraft'' sticker book made using items in the [[Character Creator|character creator]].

== Synopsis ==
'''The only official sticker books created in collaboration with Mojang!'''

Are you ready for adventure? The official ''Minecraft Character Creator Sticker Book'' takes readers on a journey across the [[Overworld]] and into the [[The Nether|Nether]] and the [[The End|End]] dimensions.

Use stickers to customise your characters and to complete puzzles and activities as you encounter a host of ''Minecraft''â€™s [[Mob|mobs]] and [[Biome|biomes]].
